title: How does education help us perceive things that change our perception? - Quora

response.answer_text: Perception changes or alters with education, it alters with knowledge. This is the key to all spiritual understanding ,The ability to see, hear, or become aware of something through the senses gives birth to perception,which other wise is ,deaf and dumb on its own. Without sound, the ear and its quality, its GUNA will not be realized, without an object of sight, sight with its quality,GUNA will not be realized, and without a movement, an action, an activity the stirring of the ability ,that is the human intellect will not be realized. Self realization is a knowledge , a knowledge that is intellectual in being, to the extent the intellectual ability is perceived or is related to it reveals itself, the deeper the understanding of this action ,this activity the deeper is the change and alteration in perception. What is this change, this alteration which is there in perception, which is otherwise born mute, it is speech, Spiritual science says , this is the key, in the beginning was the word, that which is mute alters and speaks , this expression alters the silent, mute,intellectual perception in being. Well, its to be grasped, but it is there, this perceiving self altered in and with all knowledge in being, its PARA and APARA vidya, where objective alteration ends the subjective shines pristine in being.

The education system as it is in India,sharpens the intellect 2 some extent but we need 2 go even beyond the intellect n then can we perceive things as they r. We can go beyond the intellect in meditation.
